snippet.title: Sanity of Morris Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Sanity of Morris: a psychological horror adventure game. Your flashlight reveals the clues you need to stay sane, in the search for your father. Discover the truth! Could aliens be real? 

Sanity of Morris launches the 23rd of March for Playstation 4, Xbox X and Steam (PC, Linux and macOS) and will be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X. We'll run a 15% discount to celebrate the launch on Steam, Xbox and for PlayStationPlus members. 

You can checkout the Steampage  today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275660
